snippet: For many of the men who have headed Goldman Sachs in the last 40 years, the job has been a stepping-off point to prominent positions in government.
lead_paragraph: For many of the men who have headed Goldman Sachs in the last 40 years, the job has been a stepping-off point to prominent positions in government.

headline.seo: Where Have All the Bankers Gone?
headline.main: Where Have All the Bankers Gone?
